reviewText:
his set is an interesting overview of Bowie's work throughout the 1970s. There is quite a bit of archive footage and music clips plus good interviews with the likes of ex-Spiders, members of Kraftwerk and other German bands who he worked with in the later 70s plus people like the late DJ John Peel who championed Bowie at the start.

There are two full length DVDs in a nice foldout cardboard sleeve and all for 6. Snap it up while you can, this is a bargain.
